long_description: Kick back and relax around the campfire or inside your large family camping tent with the low-back Woods Frontier Chair. With a 14 in. seat height, this chair is perfect for those situations where headroom is limited, like in a tent or vestibule. Features padded mesh armrests. The Woods Frontier Chair comes with a heavy-duty carry bag. Closeout.
short_description: Kick back and relax around the campfire or inside your large family camping tent with the low-back Woods Frontier Chair.
